info.description: backend APIs of site portal service
info.title: site portal API service

post.summary: Upload a local csv data

200.description: Success, the data field is the data UUID

post.summary: Associate flow data table to a local data

200.description: Success, the data field is the data UUID

delete.summary: Delete the data file, both the local copy and the FATE table

put.summary: Update data record's ID meta info

get.summary: Get all the components and their default configs. The returned format is json

post.summary: Get a job's config template, used in json template mode

parameters.description: Job requests, not all fields are required: only need to fill related ones according to job type
parameters.name: request

post.summary: Generate the conf json file from the DAG the user draw, the conf file can be consumed by Fateflow

parameters.description: The request for generate the conf json file
parameters.name: generateJobConfRequest

post.summary: Generate the DSL json file from the DAG the user draw, should be called by UI only

parameters.description: The raw json, the value should be a serialized json string
parameters.name: rawJson

post.summary: Create a new job that is created by other site, only called by FML manager
Handle job response from other sites, only called by FML manager

parameters.description: Approval context, containing the sender UUID and approval status
parameters.name: context

post.summary: Handle job status updates, only called by FML manager

parameters.description: Job status update context, containing the latest job and participant status
parameters.name: context

get.summary: Get allowed participants for a predicting job from a model

delete.summary: Delete the job. The job will be marked as delete in this site, but still viewable in other sites

post.summary: Approve a pending job

get.summary: the result data of a Predicting or PSI job, XXX: currently it will return an error message due to a bug in FATE

post.summary: Refresh the latest job status
Disapprove a pending job
Handle model creation event, called by the job context only
Publish model to online serving system

get.summary: Get list of deployment types (KFServing, FATE-Serving, etc.) this model can use

post.summary: Create a new project
Process participant unregistration event, called by FML manager only
Process data sync event, to sync the data association info from fml manager

parameters.description: Info of the project to by synced
parameters.name: request

post.summary: Process list sync event, to sync the projects list status from fml manager
Process participant info sync event, to sync the participant info from fml manager

parameters.description: Info of the project to by synced
parameters.name: request

post.summary: Process participant info update event, called by the FML manager only
Process project invitation, called by FML manager only
Process invitation acceptance response, called by FML manager only
Process invitation rejection response, called by FML manager only
Process invitation revocation request, called by FML manager only
Process project closing event, called by FML manager only
Add associated remote data to current project, called by FML manager only
Dismiss associated remote data from current project, called by FML manager only
Process participant dismissal event, called by FML manager only
Process participant leaving request, called by FML manager only
Create joined participants for a project, called by FML manager only

parameters.description: The auto-approval status, only an 'enabled' field
parameters.name: status

post.summary: Close the managed project, only available to project managing site

get.summary: Get associated data list for this project

parameters.description: participant uuid, i.e. the providing site uuid; if set, only returns the associated data of the specified participant
parameters.name: participant

post.summary: Associate local data to current project

get.summary: Get available local data for this project

delete.summary: Remove associated data from the current project

post.summary: Invite other site to this project

get.summary: Get job list for this project

post.summary: Create a new job

parameters.description: Job requests, only fill related field according to job type
parameters.name: request

post.summary: Join a pending/invited project
Leave the joined project created by other site

get.summary: Get model list for this project

parameters.description: if set to true, returns all sites, including not joined ones
parameters.name: all

delete.summary: Remove pending participant (revoke invitation) or dismiss joined participant

post.summary: Reject to join a pending/invited project

parameters.description: The site information, some info like id, UUID, connected status cannot be changed
parameters.name: site

post.summary: Test site connection to fate flow service
Connect to fml manager and register itself
Unregister from the fml manager
Test site connection to Kubeflow, including MinIO and KFServing

get.summary: Return current user in the jwt token

200.description: Success, the name of current user

post.summary: login to site portal
logout from the site portal

parameters.description: Permission, must contain all permissions, otherwise the missing once will be considered as false
parameters.name: permission

description.description: Description contains more text about this site

external_host.description: ExternalHost is the IP or hostname this site portal service is exposed

external_port.description: ExternalPort the port number this site portal service is exposed

fate_flow_connected.description: FATEFlowConnected is whether the portal has connected to FATEFlow after the address is configured

fate_flow_connected_at.description: FATEFlowConnectedAt is the last time this portal connected to the FATE flow

fate_flow_grpc_port.description: FATEFlowGRPCPort is the grpc port number of the FATE-flow service, currently not used

fate_flow_host.description: FATEFlowHost is the host address of the FATE-flow service

fate_flow_http_port.description: FATEFlowHTTPPort is the http port number of the FATE-flow service

fml_manager_connected.description: FMLManagerConnected is whether the portal is connected to FML manager

fml_manager_connected_at.description: FMLManagerConnectedAt is the last time this portal has registered to a FML manager

fml_manager_endpoint.description: FMLManagerEndpoint is of format "<http or https>://<host>:<port>"

fml_manager_server_name.description: FMLManagerServerName is used to verify FML Manager's certificate

https.description: HTTPS choose if site portal has HTTPS enabled

kubeflow_config.description: KubeflowConfig records the Kubeflow related information for deploying horizontal model to the KFServing system

kubeflow_connected.description: KubeflowConnected is whether this site has connected to the Kubeflow since it is configured

kubeflow_connected_at.description: KubeflowConnectedAt is the last time this portal has successfully connected all related Kubeflow service

party_id.description: PartyID is the id of this party

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL

https.description: Https is whether https is enabled

server_name.description: ServerName is used by Site Portal to verify FML Manager's certificate

fateboard_access.description: FATEBoardAccess controls whether the user can access fate board

notebook_access.description: NoteBookAccess controls whether the user can access notebook

site_portal_access.description: SitePortalAccess controls whether the user can access site portal

kubeconfig.description: KubeConfig is the content of the kubeconfig file to connect to kubernetes

minio_access_key.description: MinIOAccessKey is the access-key for the MinIO server

minio_endpoint.description: MinIOEndpoint is the address for the MinIO server

minio_region.description: MinIORegion is the region of the MinIO service

minio_secret_key.description: MinIOSecretKey is the secret-key for the MinIO server

minio_ssl_enabled.description: MinIOSSLEnabled is whether this connection should be over ssl

fateboard_access.description: FATEBoardAccess controls whether the user can access fate board

notebook_access.description: NoteBookAccess controls whether the user can access notebook

site_portal_access.description: SitePortalAccess controls whether the user can access site portal
